function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inclusion of irrelevant papers that do not meet the study criteria could lead to inaccurate findings.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of government measures and interventions against COVID-19 implications.","Mitigation":"Thorough screening and assessment of the eligibility criteria for inclusion of papers in the study.","Technologies":"Screening tools and software for efficient and accurate identification of relevant papers.","People":"Researchers, reviewers, and authors conducting the scoping review.","Owner":"Research team, academic institutions, and publishing journals."},{"Description":"Inaccurate classification or categorization of interventions may affect the reliability of the findings.","Impact":"Misrepresentation of the distribution and impact of economic, social, and psychological interventions.","Mitigation":"Use of standardized classification frameworks and clarity in defining intervention categories.","Technologies":"Classification algorithms and data management systems for systematic categorization.","People":"Research team members involved in data extraction and categorization.","Owner":"Research team, academic institutions, and publishing journals."},{"Description":"Conflicts between reviewers in selecting relevant citations may introduce bias and affect the study's integrity.","Impact":"Unreliable selection of citations and potential exclusion of important data.","Mitigation":"Establish clear guidelines for resolving conflicts, involving a neutral third party when necessary.","Technologies":"Collaborative review platforms for transparent documentation and conflict resolution.","People":"Reviewers, authors, and the third author involved in resolving conflicts.","Owner":"Research team, academic institutions, and publishing journals."}]}
